content: day 23 / 24 jingle bells abbreviations chain - chain increase - increase difficulty mc - magic_ring decrease - decrease time 1 h slip_stitch - slip_stitch single_crochet - single_crochet material jute hook 3 5 mm half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet tc - treble_crochet written pattern bell repeat these instructions for the second round 0 mc bell if you wish add a real bell inside round 1 single_crochet 6 6 total round 2 increase 6 12 total round 3 - 7 single_crochet 12 12 total round 8 single_crochet increase x 6 18 total round 9 single_crochet 18 18 total cut the yarn weave the ends in red berry yarnart jeans leaf yarnart jeans round 0 mc row 0 chain 8 turn round 1 single_crochet 6 total 6 row 1 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet sc3 in the top turn cut the yarn weave the ends in row 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet tc double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet cut the yarn weave the ends in sewing and decor sew the leaves and red berry to the top of the bells if you wish to make more decorations you are free to do so hanger make the hanger from the ribbon or the yarn of your choice and attach it at the top of the bells congratulations you finished the 23rd ornament be sure to add the result in the dedicated thread in the event 1 to go
